original_query: select MIN(p1.toNode) from dblp p1, dblp p2, dblp p3, dblp p4, dblp p5, dblp p6, dblp p7, dblp p8 where p1.toNode = p2.fromNode AND p2.toNode = p3.fromNode AND p3.toNode = p4.fromNode AND p4.toNode = p5.fromNode AND p5.toNode = p6.fromNode AND p6.toNode = p7.fromNode AND p7.toNode = p8.fromNode
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E2.FromNode=E1.ToNode)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE VIEW E8 AS SELECT * FROM dblp AS dblp
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E7E8 AS SELECT * FROM E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E8 WHERE E7.ToNode=E8.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E6E7E8 AS SELECT * FROM E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7E8 WHERE E6.ToNode=E7E8.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E6E7E8 AS SELECT * FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6E7E8 WHERE E5.ToNode=E6E7E8.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E5E6E7E8 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5E6E7E8 WHERE E4.ToNode=E5E6E7E8.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E5E6E7E8 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E5E6E7E8 WHERE E3.ToNode=E4E5E6E7E8.FromNode)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E1E3E4E5E6E7E8 AS SELECT MIN(FromNode) AS EXPR$0 FROM E2E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E5E6E7E8 WHERE E2E1.ToNode=E3E4E5E6E7E8.FromNode)
